Title: Grants priority to charter school applicants with a board of trustees and school administrators that are at least fifty-one percent minority group members
Summary: Grants priority to charter school applicants with a board of trustees and school administrators that are at least fifty-one percent minority group members.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to granting priority to charter school applicants with a board of trustees and school administrators that are at least fifty-one percent minority group members
